name: Pong Pong
description:
WARNING: Screenshake. A lot of it.

If the web player gives you problems or input delay then try the Windows or Mac download.

Android version now available!

A ridiculous twist of the arcade classic "Pong" based on the game jam theme "double". Use the W/S and Up/Down keys to play, or use the left stick on two controllers. If controllers don't work, try refreshing the page with both controllers connected.

This game was made in several hours for NJ Games++ 2016 and was awarded best use of theme. It was also made in March 2016 for #1GAM. Follow me on Twitter if you want to see a new game every month!

Pong is copyright Atari Inc.
